data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chelsea have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Liverpool at Stamford Bridge.
Paul Tierney signals a Liverpool throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Chelsea.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Paul Tierney signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Chelsea's area.
In the minute 12, Liverpool are pushing forward but Georginio Wijnaldum's finish is wide of the goal.
Paul Tierney awards Chelsea a goal kick.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 14, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Throw-in Liverpool.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
Sadio Mane of Liverpool is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 18, Chelsea to take a throw-in in Liverpool territory.
Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 21, Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chelsea's half?
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Liverpool.
In the minute 25, Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Chelsea.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Chelsea.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
In the minute 29, Paul Tierney signals a Liverpool throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Chelsea.
Liverpool needs to be cautious. Chelsea have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 33, Timo Werner of Chelsea gets in a strike, but is off target.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
In the minute 34, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Paul Tierney awards the home team a throw-in.
Liverpool's Andrew Robertson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in London.
Chelsea's Kai Havertz is whistled for offside at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 40, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Chelsea have a dangerous throw-in.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Liverpool.
Paul Tierney will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In London Liverpool attack through Trent Alexander-Arnold. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, At Stamford Bridge, Andreas Christensen is shown a red card and sent off.
The second-half is underway at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 46, Fikayo Tomori is on a sub for Kai Havertz for Chelsea.
Liverpool make their first substitution with Thiago Alcantara replacing Jordan Henderson.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
In the minute 49, Can Liverpool capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Sadio Mane scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Roberto Firmino.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Chelsea in their own half.
Liverpool take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Sadio Mane.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Liverpool at Stamford Bridge.
Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
In the minute 62, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The away team have replaced Naby Keita with James Milner. This is the second substitution made today by Jurgen Klopp.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Liverpool's Georginio Wijnaldum is on target but unsuccessful.
Chelsea's Mason Mount breaks free at Stamford Bridge. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 68, Paul Tierney awards Liverpool a goal kick.
Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Chelsea have been awarded a penalty in London...
Paul Tierney awards Chelsea a penalty but Jorginho misses from 12 yards.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
In the minute 78, Free kick Liverpool.
Liverpool are coming forward and Trent Alexander-Arnold gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Chelsea have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Ross Barkley is replacing Mateo Kovacic for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
Tammy Abraham is replacing Jorginho for the home team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 81, Paul Tierney signals a Liverpool throw-in in Chelsea's half.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Thiago Alcantara for Liverpool gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
Tammy Abraham of Chelsea smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
The away team replace Roberto Firmino with Takumi Minamino.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Chelsea.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
Sadio Mane gets his shot on target but fails to score for Liverpool.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Liverpool's Mohamed Salah gets in a shot on goal at Stamford Bridge. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Liverpool's Georginio Wijnaldum breaks free at Stamford Bridge. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Paul Tierney awards Chelsea a goal kick.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
